results.description: Combine short-term returns and volume surge to capture persistent buying. Applied SUGGESTION1 by using two datafields (PRICE, VOLUME). SUGGESTION2 not applicable (no vector fields). SUGGESTION3: if coverage low, apply ts_backfill on VOLUME. SUGGESTION4: prefer PRICE and VOLUME as high-userCount fields — applied. Confidence set to 0.78 based on historical robustness of short momentum.

Mean-revert stocks that plunged versus their 60-day mean price. SUGGESTION1: used PRICE and MARKET_CAP to avoid microcaps. SUGGESTION2: none. SUGGESTION3: apply ts_backfill(MARKET_CAP,30) if sparse. SUGGESTION4: prefer PRICE (high alphaCount) — applied. Confidence 0.70.

Buy stocks with positive earnings surprise and upward revision in analyst estimates. SUGGESTION1: combine EPS_REV and ANALYST_REV. SUGGESTION2: not used. SUGGESTION3: ts_backfill(ANALYST_REV,60) if coverage<0.6. SUGGESTION4: prefer fields with many users — applied where possible. Confidence 0.72.

Long stocks whose realised volatility expands above recent average, signaling breakout. SUGGESTION1: use PRICE and IMPLIED_VOL where available. SUGGESTION2: if IMPLIED_VOL is vector (surface), use vec_avg(IMPLIED_VOL) — applied. SUGGESTION3: ts_backfill(IMPLIED_VOL,20) if sparse. SUGGESTION4: choose vol fields with high userCount when possible. Confidence 0.65.

Favor stocks with improving liquidity (rising ADV) and declining bid-ask spreads. SUGGESTION1: combine ADV and SPREAD. SUGGESTION2: none. SUGGESTION3: ts_backfill(SPREAD,30) if needed. SUGGESTION4: target widely-used ADV field. Confidence 0.60.

Short-covering signal: large drop in short interest often precedes short-term rallies. SUGGESTION1: use SHORT_INT and PRICE. SUGGESTION2: none. SUGGESTION3: ts_backfill(SHORT_INT,90) if coverage low. SUGGESTION4: use high-alphaCount SHORT_INT if available. Confidence 0.58.

Long stocks outperforming their sector average returns. SUGGESTION1: PRICE + SECTOR group. SUGGESTION2: none. SUGGESTION3: not applicable. SUGGESTION4: PRICE has high userCount — applied. Confidence 0.66.

Combine profitability quality metric and 6-month momentum to avoid low-quality momentum traps. SUGGESTION1: use ROIC and PRICE returns. SUGGESTION2: none. SUGGESTION3: ts_backfill(ROIC,180) if sparse. SUGGESTION4: prioritize commonly used ROIC field. Confidence 0.74.

Buy stocks that unexpectedly increase dividends or announce reinstatements combined with supportive price action. SUGGESTION1: DIV_CHANGE and PRICE. SUGGESTION2: none. SUGGESTION3: ts_backfill(DIV_CHANGE,365) if needed. SUGGESTION4: use fields with solid coverage. Confidence 0.55.

Long stocks receiving recent analyst upgrades plus price momentum. SUGGESTION1: ANALYST_REV and PRICE. SUGGESTION2: none. SUGGESTION3: ts_backfill(ANALYST_REV,90) if sparse. SUGGESTION4: prefer analyst fields tracked by many users. Confidence 0.67.

Sell short stocks with strong post-earnings spikes but poor medium-term returns (mean-revert after hype). SUGGESTION1: EPS_REV and PRICE. SUGGESTION2: none. SUGGESTION3: ts_backfill(EPS_REV,60) if low coverage. SUGGESTION4: use widely available EPS_REV. Confidence 0.61.

Exploit monthly/quarterly seasonality (e.g., January effect) by combining PRICE returns and month-of-year indicator. SUGGESTION1: PRICE + DATE feature. SUGGESTION2: none. SUGGESTION3: not used. SUGGESTION4: PRICE high userCount applies. Confidence 0.50.

results.idea: Momentum with ts_decay_linear to smooth signals
results.description: Use time-decayed returns to emphasize recent moves while controlling turnover. SUGGESTION1: PRICE only. SUGGESTION2: none. SUGGESTION3: not used. SUGGESTION4: PRICE applied. Confidence 0.73.

results.idea: Momentum signal trimmed by tail operator
results.description: Suppress tiny signals with tail to avoid noise trading; apply tail to z-scored returns. SUGGESTION1: PRICE only. SUGGESTION2: none. SUGGESTION3: not used. SUGGESTION4: PRICE used. Confidence 0.70.

Apply hump to momentum time series to reduce turnover while preserving trend sensitivity. SUGGESTION1: PRICE only. SUGGESTION2: none. SUGGESTION3: not used. SUGGESTION4: PRICE high userCount. Confidence 0.71.

results.idea: Momentum scaled by inverse group volatility
results.description: Downweight momentum in highly volatile groups by scaling with group_std_dev. SUGGESTION1: PRICE and SECTOR. SUGGESTION2: none. SUGGESTION3: not used. SUGGESTION4: PRICE applied. Confidence 0.67.

Reduce exposure to names that haven't changed recently to avoid stale signals. SUGGESTION1: PRICE and days_from_last_change. SUGGESTION2: none. SUGGESTION3: not needed. SUGGESTION4: PRICE used. Confidence 0.59.

results.idea: Momentum with quantile normalization then group neutralize
results.description: Normalize momentum using quantile then neutralize to sector to form diversified exposures. SUGGESTION1: PRICE and SECTOR. SUGGESTION2: none. SUGGESTION3: not used. SUGGESTION4: PRICE applied. Confidence 0.74.

results.idea: Momentum with ts_zscore on vector of related tickers (vec_avg)
results.description: Average returns across supplier or peer vector and combine with stock momentum for confirmation. SUGGESTION1: PEER_RET vector and PRICE. SUGGESTION2: applied vec_avg(PEER_RET). SUGGESTION3: backfill vec_avg if sparse. SUGGESTION4: peer vectors less common — lower confidence. Confidence 0.48.

results.idea: Momentum with winsorize and normalize chain
results.description: Winsorize extreme returns, zscore, then normalize cross-sectionally to stabilize weights. SUGGESTION1: PRICE only. SUGGESTION2: none. SUGGESTION3: not used. SUGGESTION4: PRICE applied. Confidence 0.75.

Ensure each sector contributes by scaling signals by inverse group_count to avoid concentration. SUGGESTION1: PRICE and SECTOR. SUGGESTION2: none. SUGGESTION3: not used. SUGGESTION4: PRICE applied. Confidence 0.66.

results.idea: Momentum with ts_target_tvr_decay for turnover control
results.description: Construct momentum then tune ts_target_tvr_decay to achieve target turnover, limiting transaction costs. SUGGESTION1: PRICE only. SUGGESTION2: none. SUGGESTION3: not used. SUGGESTION4: PRICE applied. Confidence 0.70.
Winsorize returns then neutralize to sector to limit outliers and sector bets. SUGGESTION1: PRICE and SECTOR. SUGGESTION2: none. SUGGESTION3: not used. SUGGESTION4: PRICE applied. Confidence 0.73.

results.idea: Momentum with vec_range of options skew
results.description: Use vector range (max-min) of options skews to spot unusual demand and combine with momentum. SUGGESTION1: OPTIONS_SKEW vector and PRICE. SUGGESTION2: applied vec_range(OPTIONS_SKEW). SUGGESTION3: backfill vec_range if sparse. SUGGESTION4: options vectors lower userCount. Confidence 0.45.
